unittitle_ssm: Dwight B. Demeritt, Jr. collection of 19th century Brooklyn portraits
abstract_ssm: The collection is composed of cabinet cards and cartes-de-visite from commercial portrait studios in Brooklyn, N.Y. Portraits in the collection show Brooklyn and New England men, women, and children, some of whom are identified by name and address.
collection_ssm: Dwight B. Demeritt, Jr. collection of 19th century Brooklyn portraits
heading_ssm: Dwight B. Demeritt, Jr. collection of 19th century Brooklyn portraits
